company_overview.name: AtYourDoorStep
company_overview.description: AtYourDoorStep is a proudly Indian, family-run business bringing the essence of purity, tradition, and quality directly to your home. From the sweetness of our Ratnagiri Alphonso mangoes to the rich minerals of our organic jaggery, and the wholesome goodness of our cold-pressed oils — we deliver farm-fresh, factory-direct products with no middlemen and no compromises.
company_overview.establishment: Built on 30+ years of traditional processing experience
company_overview.core_principle: Purity with convenience, rooted in Indian traditions and powered by modern delivery

company_story.beginning: We began over 30 years ago with a small, traditional jaggery unit near sugarcane fields — built on values of purity, tradition, and hard work.
company_story.mission: At the heart of this growth lies a simple yet powerful mission: To bring honest, chemical-free, and high-quality products into Indian households, while making the process as easy and accessible as possible.
company_story.evolution: Today, AtYourDoorstep is more than just a brand — it's a promise of purity with convenience, rooted in Indian traditions and powered by modern delivery.

mango_orchards.description: Located in Ratnagiri, thriving on red laterite soil and clean air, producing premium Alphonso mangoes.

jaggery_warehouse.description: Built near sugarcane farms, where juice is boiled in iron pans over firewood, the traditional way.

cold_pressing_unit.description: Operates in a controlled hygienic environment, where quality seeds are cold-pressed without heat or chemicals.

jaggery.description: Our jaggery is made using age-old methods in our own processing facility — rich in minerals, free from chemicals.

cold_pressed_oils.description: We've been extracting unrefined oils (coconut, sesame, groundnut, mustard) using the traditional wooden ghani method in our cold-pressing facility — keeping nutrients intact.

mangoes.description: We've been hand-picking the finest GI-tagged Alphonso mangoes from Ratnagiri. No carbide, no shortcuts — just naturally ripened, sun-kissed fruits.

purity.title: 100% Purity Guarantee
purity.description: All products are completely chemical-free and processed using traditional methods

tradition.title: Time-tested Traditions
tradition.description: 30+ years of traditional processing expertise passed down through generations

quality.title: Premium Quality Assurance
quality.description: Rigorous quality checks and direct sourcing ensure the finest products

convenience.title: Modern Convenience
convenience.description: Traditional products delivered with modern convenience to your doorstep

business_philosophy.core_belief: Bringing authentic, farm-fresh, factory-direct products with no middlemen and no compromises
